variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Subject Id

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age at Assessment
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: sex
variable.description: Sex of participant
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: race
variable.description: Racial Category
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: race_other
variable.description: If other race, please describe
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: diagnosis_fecd
variable.description: Has a diagnosis of FECD ever been made?
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: diagnosis_fecd_when
variable.description: If yes (diagnosis of FECD), when was the diagnosis made?
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: diagnosis_other
variable.description: Has the diagnosis of other corneal dystrophies ever been made?
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: family_history_fecd
variable.description: Does the participant have any relatives with a history of FECD or other corneal dystrophies?
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_pk_surgery
variable.description: Has the participant had any previous keratoplasty?
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_pk_od
variable.description: Penetrating Keratoplasty or DSEK in OD
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_pk_od_age
variable.description: Age of OD surgery
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_pk_os
variable.description: Penetrating Keratoplasty or DSEK in OS
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_pk_os_age
variable.description: Age of OS surgery
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_cat_surgery
variable.description: Has the participant had any previous cataract surgery? (corneal or glaucoma surgery/laser eyes are excluded)
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_cat_od
variable.description: OD Cataract Surgery?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_cat_od_age
variable.description: Age of OD Cataract Surgery
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_cat_os
variable.description: OS Cataract Surgery?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: previous_cat_os_age
variable.description: Age of OS Cataract Surgery
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_normal_od
variable.description: Is the OD cornea normal?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_epi_norm_od
variable.description: If OD cornea is abnormal, is the epithelium normal?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_epi_dys_od
variable.description: If OD epithelium is abnormal, dystrophy (e.g. map-dot-fingerprint)?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_epi_ede_od
variable.description: If OD epithelium is abnormal, edema?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_epi_inf_od
variable.description: If OD epithelium is abnormal, infiltrates?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_epi_vas_od
variable.description: If OD epithelium is abnormal, vascularization?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_epi_other_od
variable.description: If OD epithelium is abnormal, are there any other abnormalities? Please specify:
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_str_norm_od
variable.description: If OD cornea is abnormal, is the stroma normal?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_str_dys_od
variable.description: If OD stroma is abnormal, dystrophy (e.g. granular)?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_str_ede_od
variable.description: If OD stroma is abnormal, edema?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_str_inf_od
variable.description: If OD stroma is abnormal, infiltrates?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_str_sca_od
variable.description: If OD stroma is abnormal, scarring?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_str_vas_od
variable.description: If OD stroma is abnormal, vascularization?
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_str_other_od
variable.description: If OD stroma is abnormal, are there any other abnormalities? Please specify:
variable.comment: Controls only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: cornea_end_norm_od
variable.description: If OD cornea is abnormal, is the Descemet's/Endothelium normal?
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.description: If OD endothelium is abnormal, guttae?
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.description: If OD endothelium is abnormal, vesicles?

variable.name: cornea_end_other_od
variable.description: If OD endothelium is abnormal, are there any other abnormalities? Please specify:
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: fecd_grading_time
variable.description: Time of FECD Grading?
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: fecd_grading_time_meridiem
variable.description: AM or PM (time of FECD Grading)
variable.comment: Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: fecd_grading_od
variable.description: FECD Consortium Grade OD (oculus dexter)
variable.comment: PKP=Penetrating keratoplasty; DLK=Deep lamellar keratoplasty; DSEK=Descemet's scraping endothelial keratoplasty
variable.value: 1 to >12 central and/or paracentral corneal guttae
1 to 2mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae
>2 to 5mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae
>5mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae in the absence of stromal edema
>5mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae with stromal edema with or without epithelial edema

variable.name: fecd_grading_os
variable.description: FECD Consortium Grade OS (oculus sinister)
variable.comment: PKP=Penetrating keratoplasty; DLK=Deep lamellar keratoplasty; DSEK=Descemet's scraping endothelial keratoplasty
variable.value: 1 to >12 central and/or paracentral corneal guttae
1 to 2mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae
>2 to 5mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae
>5mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae in the absence of stromal edema
>5mm of confluent central and/or paracentral corneal guttae with stromal edema with or without epithelial edema

variable.name: pathology_obtained
variable.description: Was a pathology specimen obtained for this participant?
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: pathology_type
variable.description: If yes, what type of specimen was obtained?
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"

variable.name: pathology_result
variable.description: Were finding definitely FECD or consistent with FECD?
variable.comment: Cases only Absence of data will be indicated with "NA"
